info.readme:
This is the default starter kit for Umbraco 7.6+.
It's only compatible with Umbraco 7.6.4+, it will not install or work on older versions.

home.heroDescription: Moonfish, steelhead, lamprey southern flounder tadpole fish sculpin bigeye, blue-redstripe danio collared dogfish. Smalleye squaretail goldfish arowana butterflyfish pipefish wolf-herring jewel tetra, shiner; gibberfish red velvetfish. Thornyhead yellowfin pike threadsail ayu cutlassfish.

contact.contactIntro: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Nullam eget lacinia nisl. Aenean sollicitudin diam vitae enim ultrices, semper euismod magna efficitur.

GenericProperty.Name: How many posts should be shown?
Disqus Shortname
GenericProperty.Description: To use comments, you'll need to sign up for Disqus and enter your shortname here (more info: https://help.disqus.com/customer/portal/articles/472097-universal-embed-code)

GenericProperty.Name: Excerpt
GenericProperty.Description: Introduction to your blog post. This is also used in the summaries on the front of the blog as well as the homepage

GenericProperty.Name: Page Title
GenericProperty.Description: The title of the page, this is also the first text in a google search result. The ideal length is between 40 and 60 characters

GenericProperty.Name: Pick a Contact Form
GenericProperty.Description: If Umbraco Forms is installed you'll be able to select a form here.

GenericProperty.Name: Page Title
GenericProperty.Description: The title of the page, this is also the first text in a google search result. The ideal length is between 40 and 60 characters

GenericProperty.Name: ApiKey
GenericProperty.Description: To use the map you'll need your own Google API key. More information here: https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/error-messages#no-api-keys

GenericProperty.Name: Your Address
GenericProperty.Description: Plot your address on the map and it'll be displayed on the contact page

GenericProperty.Name: Page Title
GenericProperty.Description: The title of the page, this is also the first text in a google search result. The ideal length is between 40 and 60 characters

GenericProperty.Name: Color Theme
GenericProperty.Description: This will be a custom property editor later

GenericProperty.Name: Hero Background
GenericProperty.Description: Spice up the homepage by adding a beautiful photo that relates to your business

GenericProperty.Name: Sitename
GenericProperty.Description: Used on the homepage as well as the title and social cards

GenericProperty.Name: Font
GenericProperty.Description: This will be a custom property editor later

GenericProperty.Name: Logo
GenericProperty.Description: Optional. If you add a logo it'll be used in the upper left corner instead of the site name. Make sure to use a transparent logo for best results

GenericProperty.Name: Call To Action Caption
GenericProperty.Description: Caption on the Call To Action Button

GenericProperty.Name: Call To Action Caption
GenericProperty.Description: The caption on the button

GenericProperty.Name: Header
GenericProperty.Description: This is the main headline for the hero area on the Homepage

GenericProperty.Name: Hide in Navigation
GenericProperty.Description: If you don't want this page to appear in the navigation, check this box

GenericProperty.Name: Description
GenericProperty.Description: A brief description of the content on your page. This text is shown below the title in a google search result and also used for Social Sharing Cards. The ideal length is between 130 and 155 characters

GenericProperty.Name: Keywords
GenericProperty.Description: Keywords that describe the content of the page. This is consired optional since most modern search engines don't use this anymore

GenericProperty.Name: Photos
GenericProperty.Description: You can add multiple photos - the first one will be the default and used in overviews and lists

GenericProperty.Name: Default Currency
GenericProperty.Description: This is just used to prefix pricing

Template.Name: Blog
Blogpost
Contact
Content Page
Home
Master
People
Person
Product
Template.Design:
@inherits UmbracoTemplatePage @using ContentModels = Umbraco.Web.PublishedContentModels; @{ Layout = "Master.cshtml"; } @Html.Partial("~/Views/Partials/SectionHeader.cshtml", Model.Content.Parent)

@Model.Content.ProductName

@Model.Content.Parent.GetPropertyValue("DefaultCurrency") @Model.Content.Price.ToString("F")
@Model.Content.Description
@if (Model.Content.Features != null) { foreach (var feature in Model.Content.Features) {

@feature.GetPropertyValue("featureName")

@feature.GetPropertyValue("featureDetails")
} }
@Html.GetGridHtml(Model.Content, "bodyText", "bootstrap3-fluid")

Template.Name: Products

property.name: How many posts should be shown
Where to get blog posts from

DataType.Name: Home - Call To Action Link - Content Picker
Contact - Contact Intro - Rich Text Editor
Home - Color Theme - Radio button list
Blog - How many posts should be shown - Slider
Contact - Pick a Contact Form - Form Picker
